mapper.select: SELECT a.*, IFNULL(m.nickname, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__writer FROM article a LEFT JOIN `member` m ON m.id = a.memberId WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM article WHERE 1
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY id DESC

SELECT a.*, IFNULL(m.nickname, "탈퇴회원") AS extra__writer FROM article a LEFT JOIN `member` m ON m.id = a.memberId WHERE 1
AND a.boardId = #{boardId}
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') OR `body` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart}, #{limitTake}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}
